strategy: The Legiones Skitarii have a Strategy Rating of 3.
Initiative: Collegia Titanica formations have an Initiative Rating of 1+. All other formations have a Initiative Rating of 2+.
usage: The following army list allows you to field an army based on the Skitarii of the Adeptus Mechancius

formations.name: Hypaspist Maniple
extraUnits: Replace three Hypaspists with three Rapiers: Free
Replace two Hypaspists with two Sagitarii: 25 points

sections.name: Legiones Metalica Line Formations
sections.description: Up to three Metalica Line Formations for each Core Formation.

formations.name: Ballistae Cohort
extraUnits: Replace one unit of Sagitarii with three Rapiers: 25 points
Add enought Chimeras or Chimedons to transport the formation with no space left over: 25 points each

formations.name: Kastelan Maniple
extraUnits: Add up to two Kastelan Robots for 25 points each

formations.name: Praetorian Maniple
formations.units: One Tech-Priest, five Praetorian Combat Servitors

formations.name: Cataphractii Maniple
formations.units: Six Leman Russ, Leman Russ Demolishers or Leman Russ Executioners

sections.name: Forge World Navy, Collegia Titanica and Questoris Mechanicus Support
sections.description: Up to a third of the points available may be spent on these formations

formations.name: Warhound Pack
formations.units: Two Warhound Aufklärer Titans, both of either Standard or Support Configuration

upgrades.title: Legiones Metalica Upgrades
upgrades.description: Each upgrade may be taken once per formation

items.name: 0-1 Oberbefehlshaber
items.description: Replace the Magos with an Magos Dominus

items.name: Hypaspist Transport
items.description: Add one Gorgon, five Chimeras, or five Chimedons

items.name: Minoris Support Weapon
items.description: Upgrade one Minoris to carry a Support Weapon

items.name: Ordinatus Mars
items.description: Replace the Ordinatus Armageddon with an Ordinatus Mars (Sonic Disruptor)

items.name: Ordinatus Golgotha
items.description: Replace the Ordinatus Armageddon with an Ordinatus Golgotha (Hellfire Raketen)

items.name: Panzer Hunter
items.description: Upgrade both Warhounds to Panzer Hunter Configuration
